page.title: Interface
page.t: %1: '%2' unable to find any ware that can be collected by this ship in this cluster!
Try to free up some cargo space by dropping %1 %2
%1: '%2' Trade '%3' from '%4' \(available amount: %5 \) for '%6'\(%7Cr price per unit\). Sell to '%8' \(wanted amount %9\) for '%10' \(%11Cr price per unit\)
%1: '%2' I transfer my surplus over %3 Cr.

arrangement talent: '%ss'

 Charisma: '%s%%'

I found a deal. I want to buy ware '$TRADEWARE$ \($WAREPRICEMIN$ Cr - $WAREPRICEMAX$ Cr\)' Volume: '$TRADEWAREVOLUME$'.\n Buy price '$WAREPRICESELLOFFER$ Cr' Sell Price '$WAREPRICEBUYOFFER$ Cr'

$SHIP$

 buyed amount: $AMOUNTBUY$ Buy price: $PRICEBUY$ Cr
Sellamount: $AMOUNTSELL$ Selled price: $PRICESELL$ Cr 
 Profit: $PROFIT$ Cr

Congratulations.
I was able to negotiate a permanent contract with the following station:
"$STATION$"
They are now regularly sent to us the trade data.

Select whether the messages are sent to the logbook
